00065 #define B3_MAX_STRING_LENGTH 1024
00066 
00067 typedef struct
00068 {
00069         char m_deviceName[B3_MAX_STRING_LENGTH];
00070         char m_deviceVendor[B3_MAX_STRING_LENGTH];
00071         char m_driverVersion[B3_MAX_STRING_LENGTH];

00076         size_t                                  m_workitemDims;

00079         size_t                                  m_image2dMaxHeight;
00080         size_t                                  m_image3dMaxWidth;
00081         size_t                                  m_image3dMaxHeight;
00082         size_t                                  m_image3dMaxDepth;
00083         size_t                                  m_workgroupSize;
00084         cl_uint                                 m_clockFrequency;
00085         cl_ulong                                m_constantBufferSize;
00086         cl_ulong                                m_localMemSize;
00087         cl_ulong                                m_globalMemSize;
00088     cl_bool                                     m_errorCorrectionSupport;
00089         cl_device_local_mem_type m_localMemType;

00091         cl_uint                                 m_maxWriteImageArgs;
00092

00108 struct b3OpenCLPlatformInfo
00109 {
00110         char m_platformVendor[B3_MAX_STRING_LENGTH];
00111         char m_platformName[B3_MAX_STRING_LENGTH];
00112         char m_platformVersion[B3_MAX_STRING_LENGTH];
00113         
00114         b3OpenCLPlatformInfo()
00115         {
00116                 m_platformVendor[0]=0;
00117                 m_platformName[0]=0;
00118                 m_platformVersion[0]=0;
00119         }
00120 };

00124 struct b3OpenCLUtils

00128         static inline cl_context        createContextFromType(cl_device_type deviceType, cl_int* pErrNum, void* pGLCtx = 0, void* pGLDC = 0, int preferredDeviceIndex = -1, int preferredPlatformIndex= - 1, cl_platform_id* platformId=0)
00129         {
00130                 return b3OpenCLUtils_createContextFromType(deviceType, pErrNum, pGLCtx , pGLDC , preferredDeviceIndex, preferredPlatformIndex, platformId);
00131         }

00134         {
00135                 return b3OpenCLUtils_getNumDevices(cxMainContext);
00136         }

00138         {
00139                 return b3OpenCLUtils_getDevice(cxMainContext,nr);
00140         }

00146                 b3OpenCLUtils_printDeviceInfo(device);
00147         }

00151                 return b3OpenCLUtils_compileCLKernelFromString(clContext,device, kernelSource,  kernelName, pErrNum, prog,additionalMacros);
00152         }

00156         {
00157                 return b3OpenCLUtils_compileCLProgramFromString(clContext,device, kernelSource, pErrNum,additionalMacros, srcFileNameForCaching, disableBinaryCaching);
00158         }

00160         //the following optional APIs provide access using specific platform information

00163                 return b3OpenCLUtils_getNumPlatforms(pErrNum);
00164         }

00183         {
00184                 return b3OpenCLUtils_createContextFromPlatform(platform, deviceType, pErrNum, pGLCtx,pGLDC,preferredDeviceIndex, preferredPlatformIndex);
00185         }
